error.InvalidBLSSignature: invalid BLS signature, try again later

fee.networkFeeTooltip: This is the estimated amount of {gasTokenSymbol} it will cost to process this transaction on {mainNetworkChain}. <link>Learn more</link>
fee.networkFeeTooltipWithFormula: This is the estimated amount of {gasTokenSymbol} it will cost to process this transaction on {mainNetworkChain}. Learn more
fee.missingFees: Unable to fetch fee estimates for all transactions. Fee estimate will be inaccurate.
fee.gasHigh: The network fee is higher than usual, the price of Gas is higher than normal on {mainNetworkChain} due to high demand. <link>Learn more</link>

watchTokenButton.ariaImport: Import {tokenSymbol} information to your wallet watch list
watchTokenButton.ariaPending: Adding {tokenSymbol} to your wallet watch list
watchTokenButton.failError: Your wallet does not support importing tokens

networkDropdown.errorNotSupported: It looks like your wallet doesn't support the Arbitrum Sepolia test network. Try connecting with a different wallet.

notFound.description: Sorry! We couldn't find the page you were looking for.

information.title: Getting test {tokenSymbol}
information.referralDescription: If you received a valid referral code from a Session Token community member, you are eligible to receive test {tokenSymbol}.
information.communityDescription: If you were part of the Token Community <session-token-community-snapshot-link></session-token-community-snapshot-link>  taken on {snapshotDate}, you are eligible to receive test {tokenSymbol}. Connect to {connectionOptions}, and then connect your wallet or enter your wallet address manually. If your eligibility is confirmed, test {tokenSymbol} will be sent to this address.
information.oxenDescription: If you registered for the <oxen-program-link></oxen-program-link> by {oxenRegistrationDate}, you are also eligible. Connect the wallet that you registered for the program with, or enter the wallet address manually. If your eligibility is confirmed, test {tokenSymbol} will be sent to this address.
information.walletRequirementDescription: You will need test {gasTokenSymbol} on the {testNetworkChain} network to use as <gas-info-link>gas</gas-info-link> for all test {tokenSymbol} transactions. You can get test {gasTokenSymbol} from an <gas-faucet-link>{testNetworkChain} faucet</gas-faucet-link>.
information.notEligible: Not eligible? {testnetName} and its Incentive Program are currently closed to the public, however we will be inviting new users to join our testnet in the future.

faucet.addTokenInfo: Make {tokenSymbol} visible in your wallet by manually importing the token.

transactions.tableCaption: A list of your faucet transactions.

form.inputAria: Enter your wallet address to receive test {tokenSymbol} from the faucet.
form.connectWalletButtonAria: Connect your wallet to receive test {tokenSymbol} from the faucet.
form.connectedWalletButtonAria: Connected to wallet, click to disconnect.

confirm.connectedWalletInfo: Your connected wallet's account <address></address> is being used to fill out this form. You will not be asked to make any transactions.
confirm.discordDisclaimer: Your connected <tooltip>Discord User ID</tooltip> will be sent with this form.
confirm.discordDisclaimerUserIdTooltip: Your Discord User ID is the unique identifier for your Discord account.
confirm.telegramDisclaimer: Your connected <tooltip>Telegram User ID</tooltip> will be sent with this form.
confirm.telegramDisclaimerUserIdTooltip: Your Telegram User ID is the unique identifier for your Telegram account.

submit.continueAria: Continue to receive test {tokenSymbol} from the faucet.
submit.checkingEligibilityAria: Checking if you are eligible to receive test {tokenSymbol} from the faucet.
submit.sendingTokensAria: Sending test {tokenSymbol} to your wallet address.
submit.transactionSuccessDescription: Test {tokenSymbol} has been sent to your wallet address.

error.invalidAddress: Wallet address is not valid. It must be a valid {ethTokenSymbol} address: {example}
error.insufficientEth: It looks like you don't have enough test {gasTokenSymbol} on {testNetworkChain}, go to <recommended-gas-faucet-link></recommended-gas-faucet-link> to get some. You have {gasAmount} test {gasTokenSymbol}
error.insufficientEthTextOnly: It looks like you don't have enough test {gasTokenSymbol} on {testNetworkChain}. You have {gasAmount} test {gasTokenSymbol}
error.incorrectChain: Faucet only works on {testnetName}, switch to {testNetworkChain} network to use the faucet.
error.faucetOutOfTokens: Faucet is out of {tokenSymbol}, Please <contact-support-link></contact-support-link> for assistance.
error.faucetOutOfTokensTextOnly: Faucet is out of {tokenSymbol}, Please contact support for assistance.
error.invalidService: The {service} account you connected was not part of the community snapshot on {snapshotDate} and is not eligible for testnet access.
error.invalidOxenAddress: This wallet address was not registered for the {oxenProgram} on {oxenRegistrationDate} and is not eligible for testnet access.
error.alreadyUsedService: The connected {service} account has already been used to claim testnet {tokenSymbol} for another wallet address.
error.alreadyUsed: The connected wallet address has already been used to claim testnet {tokenSymbol}.
error.authFailed: {service} authentication failed. Please refresh the page and try again.
error.referralCodeCantBeUsedByCreator: Referral code can't be used by this wallet, consider sharing it with someone.
error.referralCodeOutOfUses: Referral code is out of uses.
error.referralCodeAlreadyUsed: You have already used this referral code.

form.transactionHashDescription: Transaction hash of the faucet transaction.
form.haveSomeMore: Alright then, you can have some more
form.watchSENTInfo: You may need to manually add {tokenSymbol} to your walletâ€™s token list to make it show up, click the button below to add it.
form.referralCodeAdded: Faucet referral code detected and added.

chainBanner.unsupportedChain: You are currently on an unsupported chain. <link>Click here to switch chain</link>
chainBanner.mainnetNotLive: {mainnetName} is not live yet. <link>Click here to switch to {testnetName}</link>

banner.registrationPaused: Stagenet node registration is temporarily paused. Apologies for any inconvenience, we expect to be able to re-enable registrations soon. For updates, visit the <link>Session Token discord</link>.
banner.claimRewardsDisabled: Stagenet rewards claim is temporarily paused. Apologies for any inconvenience, we expect to be able to re-enable rewards claiming soon. For updates, visit the <link>Session Token discord</link>.
banner.newTokenContract: The Session Token contract has been updated. <remove-token-link>Remove the old token</remove-token-link> and <watch-token>add the new token contract</watch-token> to your wallet watch list to continue using the Staking Portal. If you have any questions, visit the <link>Session Token Discord</link>.

openNodes.title: Open Session Nodes
openNodes.description: Nodes that are open for staking. <link>Learn more</link>
openNodes.noNodesP1: There are currently no Open Session Nodes available to stake to.
openNodes.noNodesP2: Check out the <link>docs</link> to learn about setting up and registering your own Session Node.
openNodes.landingP1: Stake your {tokenSymbol} to multicontributor nodes and help secure the network.
openNodes.landingP2: You can also set up your own multicontributor node for others to stake to.

openNodes.landingP2Mainnet: Want to run your own Session Node?
openNodes.learnMoreButtonAria: Navigate to the Session Node documentation page.

points.title: Testnet Points
points.description: These points determine your eventual share of Session Tokens as part of the Testnet Incentive Program. <link>Learn more</link>.

referral.title: Referral Program
referral.description1: Grow the Session Network by inviting others to join the testnet. Share your unique referral link to invite newcomers to claim test SENT tokens and stake to multicontributor nodes.
referral.description3: By participating in the Testnet Referral Program, you agree to these <link>terms and conditions</link>.
referral.description4: This code has been used <text-medium>{uses}</text-medium> times and has <text-medium>{remainingUses}</text-medium> remaining uses. Each use gives <text-medium>{drip}</text-medium>

general.publicKeyDescription: This node's unique public identifier on the Session Network
general.blsKeyDescription: This node's public cryptographic key for interacting Session smart contracts
general.operatorAddressTooltip: The wallet address of the node operator.
general.beneficiaryAddressTooltip: The wallet address rewards are sent to.
general.operatorFeeDescription: Operators of multi-contributor nodes can set an operator fee to help cover operating costs. The operator fee is a percentage of the total node rewards. After this fee is deducted, the remaining rewards are distributed to all contributors, including the operator, based on their respective stake amounts.

staking.stakedBalanceDescription: Your total staked {tokenSymbol} in the node.
staking.minimumContributionDescription: Minimum amount of {tokenSymbol} that can be staked to this node.
staking.maximumContributionDescription: Maximum amount of {tokenSymbol} that can be staked to this node.
staking.stakedAmountDescription: Amount of {tokenSymbol} staked to this node.

shared.notEnoughTokensAlert: It looks like you don't have enough {tokenSymbol} to stake to this node. It looks like your wallet has {walletAmount}, please make sure you have at least {tokenAmount} in your wallet before staking.
shared.stakeAmountDescription: Amount of {tokenSymbol} you are staking to this node
shared.totalStakedDescription: The amount of {tokenSymbol} staked to this node, including your stake
shared.yourStakeDescription: The amount of {tokenSymbol} you have staked to this node
shared.operatorAddressTooltip: The address of the node operator.
shared.operatorAddressDescription: The wallet address of the node operator
shared.autoActivateDescription: If enabled, this node will automatically join the network once fully staked
shared.rewardsAddressDescription: The wallet address that you will claim rewards to
shared.operatorFeeDescription: Percentage of node rewards taken as a fee by the operator, with remaining rewards distributed to contributors, proportional to stake amount
shared.reserveSlotsDescription: You can reserve up stakes for specific contributors to your node.
shared.proxyApprovalNotNeededTooltip: Already approved for {amount}, proxy approval not needed for stake amount.

validation.underMinOperator: Node operators must stake at least {min} (25%)

staking.rewardsAddressDescription: Rewards will be claimable to the wallet you are registering with, or you can specify a different wallet address

manage.stakeAmountAdditionalDescription: Additional stake amount to add to the existing stake.

error.specialDescription: Something went wrong when trying to stake to the node, <please-contract-support-link></please-contract-support-link>

disabledReason.alreadyFinalized: The node details are already finalized and can't be edited.
disabledReason.alreadyContributedOperatorFee: The operator fee can't be edited once another address has contributed to the node.
disabledReason.alreadyContributedReservedSlots: The reserved slots can't be edited once another address has contributed to the node.
disabledReason.pastTimeLimitStakeAmountRemove: You can't remove your stake from a node after {timeLimitAmount} from your previous stake to that node.

buttonContinue.aria: Continue to the next stage of the registration process

buttonConfirm.aria: Confirm the input and continue to the next stage of the registration process

buttonBack.aria: Go back to the previous stage of the registration process

buttonConfirmAndStake.aria: Confirm the registration data and stake to the node

submit.preparedAtDescription: Time since this node's registration was prepared

loading.title: Checking for existing registrations
loading.foundRunning: Another node with this key is already registered. Your registration cannot be finalized until the other node exits the network.
loading.foundOpen: An open node was found with the same key, you need to delete the node before creating a new one.

start.title: Do you want to stake by yourself or with others?
start.description: To stake by yourself, you need to stake <text-bold>{minStakeSolo}</text-bold>.
start.description2: To operate a node and stake with others, you need to stake at least <text-bold>{minStakeMulti}</text-bold>.

buttonSolo.aria: Continue the registration process by staking the full {minStakeSolo} yourself.

buttonMulti.aria: Continue the registration process by staking at least {minStakeMulti} yourself.

express.tooltip: Skip detailed setup and use default settings (you can edit specific settings later)

stakeAmount.title: How much do you want to stake?
stakeAmount.description: As the node operator, you must stake at least {minStakeMulti}.
stakeAmount.errorUnderMin: You cannot stake under the minimum of {min}

operatorFee.title: Set your operator fee
operatorFee.description: After this fee is deducted, remaining rewards are distributed to you and your contributors, proportional to stake amount.

rewardsAddress.title: Where do you want your rewards to go?
rewardsAddress.description: Your rewards address can be the wallet you are registering with, or a different address

buttonSame.aria: Use the same wallet address as the one you are registering with

rewardsAddressInputSolo.title: Which address do you want your rewards to go to?
rewardsAddressInputSolo.description: Claimed rewards will be sent to this address.

rewardsAddressInputMulti.title: Which address do you want your rewards to go to?
rewardsAddressInputMulti.description: Claimed rewards will be sent to this address, as well as {tokenSymbol} earned from your operator fee

reserveSlots.title: Do you want to reserve stakes for specific contributors?
reserveSlots.description: You can reserve up to {remainingStake} for specific contributors to your node.

buttonSkip.aria: Skip reserving stakes for specific contributors

reserveSlotsInput.title: Which addresses do you want to reserve stakes for?

buttonAdd.aria: Add a new address to reserve stakes for

buttonRemove.aria: Remove an address from reserving stakes for

autoActivate.title: Do you want your node to activate automatically?
autoActivate.description: Automatically activate your node once fully staked, or manually activate when you are ready.

buttonAutomatic.aria: Automatically activate your node once fully staked

buttonManual.aria: Manually activate your node when you are ready
